input.sentences: the man is checking his gear before the presentation .
the soldiers stand up straight for the presentation .
the veteran is saluting as the general walks by .

output.sentences: The men were checking their gear before the presentation.
There is a veteran, saluting as he walks.
The soldiers get in line and are shaking his hands.
They are proud of their military graduation day.
